_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The things the mendicants should train i: The four kinds of mindfulness meditation
The four bases of psychic power
The different scenarios of disagreement: Two mendicants disagree about the teaching
Two venerables disagree on both the meaning and the phrasing
Two venerables disagree on the meaning but agree on the phrasing
Two venerables agree on the meaning but disagree on the phrasing
Two venerables agree on both the meaning and the phrasing
The different scenarios of offense or tr: The individual won't be hurt and can be drawn away from the unskillful
The individual will be hurt, but can be drawn away from the unskillful
The individual won't be hurt, but holds fast to their views
The individual will be hurt and holds fast to their views
The scenario of mutual tale-bearing (a m: Approach the most amenable mendicant and ask if the Ascetic would rebuke it
Ask if one can realize extinguishment without giving it up
Approach the most amenable mendicant among those who side with the other party and ask the same questions
If asked, answer truthfully without glorifying oneself or putting others down.
